complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: This task is straightforward and doesn't need subtasks - it's a simple debugging and removal task.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Simple debugging task involving layout inheritance analysis and removing duplicate includes. Requires basic Jekyll/Liquid knowledge but is straightforward to implement and test.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break this into: 1) Document and compare both navigation systems, 2) Remove sidebar navigation and update header, 3) Test navigation across all breakpoints and page types

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Design and implement homepage hero section

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity requiring design decisions, responsive implementation, and proper semantic HTML. Involves both visual design and technical implementation.

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex task involving Jekyll/Liquid templating, responsive grid systems, multiple data scenarios, and advanced CSS interactions. Requires handling various edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: 1) Extract and process categories from Jekyll collections, 2) Design responsive category cards with navigation, 3) Implement grid layout and hover effects
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving Jekyll data processing, responsive design, and navigation integration. Similar to featured posts but with different data structures.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: This is a straightforward content section implementation that doesn't need breakdown.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: 1) Implement scroll animations and section reveals, 2) Add hover effects and micro-interactions, 3) Ensure accessibility compliance with reduced motion, 4) Performance testing and optimization
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex task requiring advanced CSS/JavaScript animations, accessibility considerations, performance optimization, and cross-browser testing. Multiple technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving multiple optimization techniques, build process modifications, and performance measurement. Requires expertise in web performance best practices.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: 1) Cross-browser and device testing, 2) Accessibility audit and compliance testing, 3) Performance validation and issue resolution
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity requiring systematic testing across multiple dimensions. Involves various testing tools and methodologies but is primarily validation work.
